definition: patient work makes a skilled craftsman

sentences.english: There were never more highly skilled workmen than those who lived in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 在古代中国有着众多的手艺高超的能工巧匠。

sentences.english: He is the master of his own trade.
sentences.chinese: 他是他本行业的能工巧匠。

sentences.english: Grandpa is the handyman in the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷是我们这一片的能工巧匠。

sentences.english: If you work with your hands and mind, you are a craftsperson.
sentences.chinese: 将双手和思考投入工作，你会是一个能够巧匠。

sentences.english: The gorgeous decoration in the palace comes from the hands of skillful craftsmen.
sentences.chinese: 华丽的装潢都是出自能工巧匠之手。

sentences.english: Legend lu's wife is a cunning workman cloud.
sentences.chinese: 传说鲁班妻子云氏也是一位巧匠。

sentences.english: The greatest tweaker of his generation did not care to be tweaked.
sentences.chinese: 在自己的时代里，最伟大的巧匠并不喜欢被微调。

sentences.english: But Isaacson's biography suggests that he was much more of a tweaker.
sentences.chinese: 但是艾萨克森的传记中暗示他不仅仅是一个“巧匠”。

sentences.english: He was an apprentice to a master craftsman.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位能工巧匠的徒弟。

sentences.english: A lot of skillful craftsman in the ancient times of China constructed many palaces.
sentences.chinese: 我国古代很多能工巧匠建造了许多宫殿。

sentences.english: the joints of thy thighs are like jewels, the work of the hands of a cunning workman.
sentences.chinese: 你的大腿圆润，好像美玉，是巧匠的手做成的。

sentences.english: Who knows how much painstaking effort the skillful craftsmen made?
sentences.chinese: 谁能知道有多少个能工巧匠的心血与智慧在此汇聚？

sentences.english: They became skilled workers and professionals.
sentences.chinese: 他们成为能工巧匠和专业人员。

sentences.english: He is the great manipulator and pointed the way to success.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个伟大的巧匠，他指出了一条通向成功的路。

sentences.english: He really was a skillful craftsman .

definition: lit. fine sculpting (idiom); fig. to work with extreme care and precision
a rare treasure/sth priceless and unique
